meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the February 12, 2025 City Council Meeting
Authorize public hearings for FY 2025-26 Budgets
agenda_items.description: Authorize public hearings to be held on March 26, 2025, May 28, 2025, and August 27, 2025, to receive comments on the FY 2025-26 Operating, Capital, and Grant & Trust Budgets.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of bodily injury claims
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement of the bodily injury claims brought by Adam Hewitt in the lawsuit styled, Adam Hewitt v. City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of bodily injury claims
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement of the bodily injury claims brought by Kimberly Ludd in the lawsuit styled, Kimberly Ludd v. City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: Authorize grant application for Bullet Resistance Shield
agenda_items.description: Authorize the application for and acceptance of a grant from the Texas Office of the Governor for the Bullet Resistance Shield Grant.

agenda_items.title: Authorize service price agreement for E. coli testing
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for E. coli testing in rivers and lakes for the Dallas Water Utilities Department.

agenda_items.title: Authorize increase to construction services contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize an increase to the construction services contract with Oscar Renda Contracting, Inc. for additional work associated with the rehabilitation of wastewater interceptors.

agenda_items.title: Abandon utility easements
agenda_items.description: An ordinance abandoning a utility easement, a water easement, and two sanitary sewer easements.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement in lieu of condemnation
agenda_items.description: Authorize settlement in lieu of proceeding further with condemnation in the condemnation suit styled City of Dallas vs. Totsie Irene Farley.

agenda_items.title: Authorize approval of Supplemental Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize approval of the Supplemental Agreement 2 with WEX Health Inc. to cover additional fees incurred when filing IRS Form 1095.

financial_items.description: Settlement of bodily injury claims brought by Adam Hewitt
Settlement of bodily injury claims brought by Kimberly Ludd
